Due to popular demand, starting this week we are doing an Introduction to J=
apanese history series.  Our first episode covers Japan's paleolithic age t=
o the end of the Jomon period.  We examine the technology, culture, and eve=
nts of these eras.  We would appreciate feedback on the episode so that as =
we move forward through Japanes history, we can tailor it and focus on what=
 you are interested in, and the methods you find most effective in getting =
across the information.  What works, what doesn't, etc. We look forward to =
your feedback as we undertake this comprehensive introduction to Japanese h=
istory:

EP10 Intro to Japanese History Part 1 - Prehistory
